displayProperties.description: An emblem designed as tribute to a community member past, Seraphim Crypto. You can read more about their legend in [the TWAB of September 15, 2022](https://www.bungie.net/en/Explore/Detail/News/51779).

1171206947.sourceString: Source: Complete the "Last Wish" raid within the first 24 hours of release.

3938759711.sourceString: Complete the "Garden of Salvation" raid within the first 24 hours of release.

1988948484.sourceString: Source: Earned by completing the "Devine Fragmentation" exotic quest.

2273453972.sourceString: Complete the "Deep Stone Crypt" raid within the first 24 hours of release.

2172413746.sourceString: Complete the "Vault of Glass" raid and all encounter challenges within the first 24 hours of release.
